text:
South Korean Singer Jung Joon-young has recently been slammed for sharing and filming intimate scenes with his ladies. The singer-songwriter admits he did it without their consent.
Twitter
"I filmed women without their consent and shared it in a chatroom, and while I was doing so I didn't feel a great sense of guilt," he added in a statement released late Tuesday (Mar 12).
“Throughout the rest of my life, I will repent on my immoral and illegal acts that constitute crimes. I will faithfully cooperate with an investigation by police and I will readily accept whatever punishment is in store for me," the publication quoted Jung Joon-young as saying.
The singer also announced that he will be withdrawing himself entirely from the entertainment scene and that he repents his unlawful act for the rest of his life.

The news of Jung Joon Young's misdeeds has come as a shock after the news of another K pop singer Lee Seung Hyun aka Seungri emerged where he had been accused of offering sexual services at nightclubs.
The sex scandal has got everyone livid and the fans are devastated.
